data.message: Why does everyone hate on drake so much? The dude can rap and sing...so he had a few songs ghost written..who gives a fuck, he's the talent behind the mic. You don't clown on actors for not writing the script 🙄 Eminem is legend, and drake is right up there or else Eminem wouldn't have gotten on stage with him. Eminem shows up for the passion of rap not for money...

replies.message: Brett Palmer so many lames out there not understanding what drake brings to the table. He's dope all around. He never said he was better than em, he just said if Eminem made a diss, he would have something ready to come back with. True sportsmanship In my eyes. They just hate. Fuk it, I like some most of his songs lol

Drake ain't HIP-HOP!
Hard 4 U 2 undastand?

Ho dont even write his fucking song 
Or chose the way that he want to sing 
Is that hard to fucking under fucking stand
did u just say..drake is on the same level as Em?..bruh..u high?
Acai Bootedd didn't say same level "bruh"...I said he's right up there as far as success.

Assil Stan Hbashnh so fuckin what? Bottom line he makes more money and will be more successful than all of us. Ur over here riding em, when em could care less about ur ass. When all of u look stupid as fuck clowning on drake. Do u understand?

Mats Mattsson hip hop ain't what it used to be, is that hard for u to understand? U gonna sit here and tell me that drake spit off the top of he wanted to? I'm an em fan 100%, all I'm saying is you look lame as fuk clowning on drake, when the legend supports the dude.

He doesent write his songs, someone could just write me lyrics and all I would have to do is just rap it, witch almost anybody can do.
Drake isn't about anything he says, he's a pussy and has nothing on emenim. Fuck drake for all I care, emenim is a real rapper and will always be a legend.. Drake on the other hand is just a whiny fuck, fuck that guy
Maybe because drake never started from the bottom... Tried to diss em .... Now we're here.
Joshua Dixon another lame! Lol he never dissed em...but I'm sure u got a solid source
Actually you do clown on entertainment people if they don't write their own music. Artist would never let anyone else write their music.
Nestor Torres what does clowning prove? That u have nothing better to do with your life...u don't like his music, don't listen to it. Lames
SfisoWish Nala that's what I'm saying 👌🏽
